column5: Taking the kids to 50 Point Conservation area in Stoney Creek on the weekend, has anybody fished there lately ?   Any advise or tips from anybody would be greatly appreciated.

I was there this past Sunday and was using a jitterbug and managed 2 rock bass and a sunfish.  Not much concerning trout, think they are stocking it next month.  But am sure you put on a bobber and worm and should land endless amount of sunfish.  Small but I'm sure would keep the kids busy.  Good luck.
